name: Spade DEMO (48hour project)
description:
DIFFICULTY:
PRETTY HARD

Good Morning Gamer! I tried creating a game within 48 hours. This was One of my "Coding Adventures" As Sebastian Lague would have said. I Learnt a lot of things about code.I used custom name scripts and added some nice post processing.

I am a 12 yr old who loves making games if you would like to support me there is a donation option :)

CONTROLS:

ESC- Color Shop (Does Not affect your score only a way to show it better)

A,D,- Movement Left and Right

SPACE- Jump

MOUSE- Aiming

RMB- Shooting

SPECIAL:
Portals Teleport you (one on each side of the small platformer map)

ENEMIES:

Yeah just one. (I only had 48hours come on)

SPECIAL CREDIT:

LOUD - Thoughts

-Bass Nation

Enemy follow ai:

https://pressstart.vip/tutorials/2019/07/15/98/follow-enemy-ai.html

-Press Start
